column4: as far as my 2.6.12 kernel upgrade goes, how come everyone seems to think it's easier to compile your own kernel than to just apt-get a pre-packeged one?
that's rediculous! apt-get linux-image-2.6.12 and youre done
well, I have a .config from my 2.6 series; it's also much faster when you're done than a pre-compiled
